name: Laroque David
bio: David is the youngest member of iLab // Haiti at 22 years old. He is from Cite Soleil. He loves music, design, logos, and graphics. When David is not at the iLab, he enjoys fixing things like cell phones and computers. He loves to know how and why things work the way they do, and is a tinkerer at heart. David sees iLab // Haiti becoming a big company. He thinks it is necessary to work hard to succeed with work, and that this success will accelerate Haiti's development.
